results.headline: Gladiator (Movie)
results.summary_short: This movie is the answer to a question no one bothered to ask: What would happen if someone decided to film the imminent extreme football league as if it were a Chanel commercial? Ridley Scott subjects action-packed bouts of mayhem and decapitation in the Roman Colosseum to his glossy, inhuman directing style;  it's admirable but repellent. Russell Crowe is the noble Roman general who ends up fighting for his life. Crowe gives a performance with ball-of-fire intensity, suffused with a movie star's impatience. He holds the movie together, such as it is. — Elvis Mitchell
